sn35.126:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Nālandā in Pāvārika’s mango grove.
sn35.126:1.2: Then the householder Upāli went up to the Buddha … and asked him,
sn35.126:1.3: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings aren’t fully extinguished in the present life?
sn35.126:1.4: What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings are fully extinguished in the present life?” …
